original_title: Le Coq d'Or - Opéra National de Lyon
overview: Lying in bed, Tsar Dodon dreams of retirement. The problem is, people keep invading his country. His astrologer offers him a golden cockerel with magical powers, a weather vane which indicates from which direction danger will come. In his case, it will be from the East in the shape of a charming oriental princess determined to conquer his kingdom.
title: Le Coq d'Or - Opéra National de Lyon
